      • rollFromCheckedString

        public int rollFromCheckedString(java.lang.String inputDiceString)
        This function rolls a string, but does not check for errors. Will return 0 if failure.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • rollFromString

        public int rollFromString(java.lang.String inputDiceString)
                   throws DiceException
        This function rolls a string representation of dice. Will throw an error if not able to parse string, or fails for another reason.
        Specified by:
        rollFromString in interface RollDAO
        Parameters:
